Author: Justaguy#6181
Content:
i'm trying to build a basic komodo asset chain to test with and learn. I have 2 VPS set up with komodo, and i follow instructions to build and connect them. All seems to go well, but when I try to getwalletinfo or query the asset chain, i get "error: couldn't connect to server: unknown (code -1) (make sure server is running and you are connecting to the correct RPC port)"
could anyone help me out? i'm also getting Error: Cannot find the Zcash network parameters in the following directory: "/root/.zcash-params"

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: This can be the problem Cannot find the Zcash network parameters in the following directory: "/root/.zcash-params"

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Please make sure you have downloaded the zcash params

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: this takes some time make sure both nodes have them

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: zcash params should be in `~/.zcash-params`

Author: Justaguy#6181
Content: yeah, I don't have them at all. That must be it

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you need to use `./zcutil/fetch-params.sh` from inside komodo dir after cloning the repo into VPS

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Make sure you are using this guide first before launching an assetchain https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/install-Komodo-manually.html

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: no need to launch Komodo just use till the part where  it explains how to compile the komodo binaries and also the komodo folder-

Author: Justaguy#6181
Content: ok cool, thanks for the help!

Author: Justaguy#6181
Content: awesome, seems to be working now. i'm now the proud creator of bigboicoin, coming to an exchange near you /s

Author: Elmis#0347
Content:
Is BarterDex operational?
Where can I download the latest version?

Author: Acura#2748
Content: @Elmis https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/BarterDEX/releases

Author: cipi#4502
Content:
```git clone https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/BarterDEX.git
cd BarterDEX
git checkout dev
git pull
npm install
npm start```

Author: Elmis#0347
Content: Thanks

Author: Elmis#0347

Content:

Any ideas what I can do to fix it up?

Content: Which OS and repo?  please post more lines above that error to help identify the issue better.

Content: cd in to cc dir

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: make

Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
Ubuntu 18.04
Thanks, will make cc.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
```../crypto/common.h:16:10: fatal error: sodium.h: No such file or directory
 #include "sodium.h"```

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: from cc dir.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: can you try again after installing `libsodium`? use `sudo apt install libsodium-dev`

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: trying

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: i have tried multiple times yesterday, and it worked

Author: CrisF#3405

Author: CrisF#3405

That worked.  Was able to make Komodo.
Thanks!

Content:

Content:
which actual error is that? it shoould be displayed few lines above.
you can try `./zcutil/build.sh -j$(nproc)` 3-4 times

Author: Bryan_Beus#6442
Content: I don't see any other error indications

Author: Bryan_Beus#6442

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: run the command 3-4 times. if this is cryptoconditions related issue, it will compile after few times

Author: Bryan_Beus#6442
Content:
ok, now an actual error is showing up.

looks cryptoconditions related.

cryptoconditions/src/utils.c:25:10 

can't find cryptoconditions.h

Author: Bryan_Beus#6442
Content: I'll try again (4th)

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if this doesn't work after trying multiple times, just delete current source and clone fresh again

Author: Bryan_Beus#6442
Content: ok, it finally worked

Author: Bryan_Beus#6442
Content: 4th try did it

Author: SHossain#0007
